title: Launcher won't open
body:
Used to play the game a lot, but my operating system (windows 10) got corrupted. I formatted my PC and since then the game doesn't work for me. 
I downloaded the installation from the website and installed it. Tried to open the launcher, the logo appears for a couple of seconds and I get an error message. 
I tried to run it as Windows 7 and as an administrator, doesn't help. 
I got Adobe AIR installed.

Help?

replies.body: What does the error message say?  Let me know, I've got a good feeling I can help you out!

Thank you for your reply.
This is the error I get when I try to open the launcher:
http://imgur.com/qX5OHdE

Thanks for the follow up!  This issue is commonly due to an OS setting blocking the patcher from launching or scanning game files.  Running as administrator can help sometimes, but there may be other factors that's preventing launch.  I recommend going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to get this issue fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

I did every single suggestion there, no change.
{{item:3070}}

Bummer!  No worries, we can dig deeper and find out what's going on.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our tech team can help.  I also recommend using our[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to gather a set of logs for context, and attach it to the ticket.  We'll respond asap!

I've already submitted a ticket to support,  waiting for an answer.
I'll attach the log file to my ticket now.

Thanks! :)
